title: Love Memories
shortDescription: A private couples app for saving memories, tracking food spots, and managing shared goals together
fullDescription: Love Memories is a beautifully designed PWA for couples to capture their relationship — from daily moments and love letters to favorite food spots on an interactive map. It features scrum-style goal tracking, date planning, recipe sharing, budget management, and Instagram-style monthly recaps, all in a mobile-first Vietnamese UI built for two.
features: Moments & Photo Booth — capture and relive memories with multi-photo uploads and background processing
Interactive Food Map — pin favorite restaurants on a Mapbox-powered map with location search
Love Letters with voice memos — write letters with photo attachments and audio recordings
Scrum Goals & Kanban — drag-and-drop goal management organized in sprints
Monthly Recap Stories — Instagram-style full-screen animated recap of the couple's month

title: VoiceEverywhere
shortDescription: Native macOS menubar app chuyển giọng nói thành text real-time với AI post-processing
fullDescription: VoiceEverywhere là ứng dụng macOS menubar giúp chuyển đổi giọng nói thành văn bản real-time qua Soniox speech-to-text API, hỗ trợ tiếng Việt và tiếng Anh. App tự động gõ text vào bất kỳ ứng dụng nào đang focus thông qua Accessibility API, với tùy chọn LLM post-processing (xAI) để rewrite/translate/format trước khi type.
features: Real-time speech-to-text với Soniox streaming (Vietnamese + English)
Tự động type text vào bất kỳ app nào qua Accessibility API (CGEvent keyboard simulation)
LLM post-processing tùy chọn qua xAI API — rewrite, translate, format text
Format presets — tạo và quản lý các bộ instructions cho LLM formatting
Global hotkey (Ctrl+Option+Space) toggle recording từ bất kỳ đâu, menubar-only lightweight

title: WebPhim
shortDescription: A Netflix-like movie streaming platform with full video management and user features
fullDescription: WebPhim is a full-stack Netflix clone that supports video uploading, HLS transcoding, and adaptive streaming. It features user authentication, content browsing by genre, search with filters, watchlist management, continue watching, and a complete admin panel for content management.
features: HLS adaptive video streaming with upload and auto-transcoding
Browse by genre, search with maturity filters and keyword chips
User profiles with watchlist, continue watching, and watch history
Responsive design for desktop, tablet, and mobile
Admin panel for content and video management

title: HungPhu Code
shortDescription: A study/clone of Claude Code to understand how AI coding agents work internally
fullDescription: A CLI chat agent inspired by Claude Code that enables autonomous coding assistance through multiple LLM providers with built-in tool calling. Implements the agent loop pattern where the LLM decides which tools to invoke, executes them, and iterates until completing tasks. Supports autonomous file operations, code search, shell execution, and multi-step workflows.
features: Agent loop pattern with autonomous tool calling and multi-step task execution
9 specialized tools: file edit, glob, grep, bash, sub-agent spawning, and more
Multi-provider LLM support with runtime switching (xAI, OpenRouter, DTA Proxy)
Interactive REPL with slash commands and terminal UI with colored output
Autonomous project scaffolding from single natural language prompts

title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: Modern interactive portfolio with Violet→Blue gradient theme and smooth animations
fullDescription: Interactive portfolio website featuring scroll-snap sections, AI chatbot with streaming responses, admin panel for content management, Docker self-hosting with Cloudflare Tunnel, and GitHub repo auto-sync. Built with a design-first multi-agent team workflow across 17+ sprints.
features: Scroll-triggered animations with mesh blobs, 3D tilt cards, and bento grid
AI chatbot with LangChain + xAI streaming and custom admin context
Full admin panel with image upload, content CRUD, and GitHub sync
Docker self-hosting with Cloudflare Tunnel for custom domain
Built by a 4-agent tmux team (PM, Designer, Dev, QA) workflow
